Class kernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • kernel

  •  class kernel
extends java.lang.Object
    kernel class stores instructions and labels and register values for each kernel. Moreover, it prodeuces the required binary forms and output hex files.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  kernel.opcodes
      An enumuration for opcodes
      (package private) class  kernel.RegValues
      RegValues is a inner class for storing values and name of constants and registers used for initializing registers in vanilla core.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private vanillaAssembler Assembler
      a pointer to the covering assembler object for using its data memory labels.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      kernel(java.lang.String file_name, java.lang.String kernel_name, vanillaAssembler Assem)
      constructor which gets the kernel name and pointer to the covering assembler, and makes output .hex files and sets the name and assembler fields.

      outRegisters outputs the register values to .hex file.

      • setConstants

        void setConstants()
            throws java.io.IOException
        setConstants computes value of each register, based on labels and constant valuess. and outputs the info file which indicates each constant is mapped to which register, for further debugging.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
